::Striker::

Striker smiles at Spears. "Calm down. We're perfectly safe. Falling is very 
unlikely."

Right as he finishes saying this, the pod begins to shake, the energy level 
too low to retain its altitude.

"Warning. Altitude decresing at alarming rate. Falure to slow down will 
result in crash."

Striker sighs, walking over to a console and pushing a few buttons to try and 
stabolize the pod.
